welcomeText:
Dear and esteemed guests!
We are delighted to welcome you to our family restaurant 'Dilkash Shirin Taom,' where national and Turkish dishes are prepared!
The family restaurant 'Dilkash Shirin Taom' is a fusion of Turkish and European cuisines.
ğŸŒ™ Dear compatriots and guests, we invite you to the legendary family restaurant 'Dilkash,' ready to offer you warmth and delicious dishes.
